title: How to report someone after end of game screen closes?
body: So a while ago I played a game with a really toxic player that I wanted to report, but then immediately after the game other stuff came up and I forgot about it. But it was really toxic and I screenshot it at the time and I was wondering how I could report them now? Also would they still get banned if they were toxic a decent chunk of time ago?

replies.body: You canâ€™t. Only buy sending a ticket

If you need to report someone in a situation where the post-game lobby report isn't an option, your best option is to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), including any relevant evidence (screenshots, videos etc). They will forward the ticket to the Player Behaviour team who will then review the case and *should* take appropriate action. From what I understand, there's no "time limit" on players being punished for behaviour, though it may be more difficult to address the situation the more time passes, and I may be wrong on that (I'll see if I can get confirmation).
